title: How to Play with a Friend on Blackops Zombies on Xbox Live

steps.headline: Decide which friend you want to play with.
Go to your friend's profile and click "Invite to game."
If you're playing with 2 others, click "find match."

text: Turn on your Xbox 360.  Put Black Ops in.  Decide which friend you want to play with.  Click on "Zombies."  Once you're on, click "Xbox Live."  Go to your friend's profile and click "Invite to game."  Wait for him/her to accept.  If you're playing with 2 others, click "find match."  You're ready to play!
